name: Fix'n Dixin
description:
(For the best experience and to avoid the bugs in the game. Stay on the Left side of mobs so they don't hit you off the screen. :)

A Game Where you can smash houses to rebuild!!!

Controls (Also Present In-Game)

W A S D to move. 

Press the space bar to smash. 

And Press F to open the shop.

Disclaimer (This game is very buggy)

Creators

Dreamkings

Kemne

Peter Lightning

Hope you enjoy it, and if you beat the game. post your screenshot in the comments!
